title: Running GUI after installation (python 2.7)
body:
Thanks for opening this issue, and thanks for using DeepLabCut (we hope you are enjoying it ;). Please fill out the template completely, including the full "traceback" and input code that you ran to hit this error. **Your Operating system and DeepLabCut version** Using MacOS Catalina (10.15.7), with Anaconda environment DLC-CPU, and version 2.2rc2 **Describe the problem** When I have activate the conda environment by typing 'conda activate DLC-CPU' and then go to the DeepLabCut folder on my desktop and try to run 'pythonw -m deeplabcut' I get an error. Please place code inside this:
Code output

Traceback (most recent call last): File "/System/Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/2.7/lib/python2.7/runpy.py", line 163, in _run_module_as_main mod_name, _Error) File "/System/Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/2.7/lib/python2.7/runpy.py", line 111, in _get_module_details __import__(mod_name) # Do not catch exceptions initializing package File "deeplabcut/__init__.py", line 3 SyntaxError: Non-ASCII character '\xc2' in file deeplabcut/__init__.py on line 4, but no encoding declared; see http://python.org/dev/peps/pep-0263/ for details

**How to Reproduce the problem** 1. Download DLC using the details in Step 2 from this link: https://github.com/DeepLabCut/DeepLabCut/blob/master/docs/installation.md 2. Activate the env using terminal 3. navigate to where DeepLabCut is on your computer. type pythonw -m deeplabcut 4. Get the error mentioned above.
